name: Sea Monster (jZ3R0, Jebus Crust)
description: Controls:  WASD to move Space to  attack Gameplay:   In this game you are a sea monster that came out of the sea and starts to kill people, you can avoid 2 hits and the 3° hit will not be avoided so you will die in one hit, as well as the enviorment and the enemiies A game made for  the game jam: Mini Jam 108: Seaside Limitation:  Everything dies in one hit Authors: Jebus & jZ3R0
